## Loading Necessary packages

```{r}
library(XML)
library(methods)
library(rjson)
library(dplyr)
```

## XML

```{r}
bookinfo_xml <- xmlToDataFrame('bookinfo.xml')

bookinfo_xml
```

## HTML

```{r}
bookinfo_html <- readHTMLTable('bookinfo.html')

bookinfo_html
```

## JSON

```{r}
bookinfo_json <- fromJSON(file = "bookinfo.json") %>% as.data.frame

bookinfo_json
```
